title: Enjoy The Silence
lyrics:
[intro] (Bm) (D)
 
(Bm) Words like violence… (Dm) break the silence
(G) Come crashing in… (G)into my little world
(Bm) Painful to me… (Dm) pierce right through me
(G) Can't you understand… (G) oh my little girl
 
(Em) All I ever wanted… (G) all I ever needed
Is (Bm)here… in (D)my arms
(Em) Words are very… (G)unnecessary
(Bm)They… can only (Bb)do h-a-a-arm
[kazoo] (Bm) (D) x4
 
(Bm) Vows are spoken… (Dm) to be broken
(G) Feelings are intense… (G) words are trivial
(Bm) Pleasures remain… (Dm) so does the pain
(G) Words are meaningless… (G) and forgettable
 
(Em) All I ever wanted… (G) all I ever needed
Is (Bm)here… in (D)my arms
(Em) Words are very … (G)unnecessary
(Bm)They… can only (Bb)do h-a-a-arm [end]
